title: Follower count distribution on Twitter 2014
summary: This statistic shows the Percentage of Twitter in the Twitter diagnosed count distribution A 1-100 in 2014 , sorted 2014 Number .
In that year , 1-100 had an Percentage Twitter of 93.68 percentage , the highest among the referenced Twitter Number .
gold: This statistic gives information on the follower count distribution on Twitter . As of April 2014 , 93.68 percent of Twitter users had between 1 and 100 followers on the microblogging site .
